text:
@BorisJohnson The underfunded/resourced NHS has no chance of dealing with a #covid19 epidemic.

The Tory Party manifesto commitments were to build 40 hospitals, recruit 50,000 nurses and 6,000 GPs. Where are they?

Do we even have enough PPE to protect staff?

I hope we've lots of body bags😱
